author: PTI
title: COVID-19: China shuts down largest makeshift hospital in Wuhan
description: The last batch of medics leave the Leishenshan hospital.
content: As the number of coronavirus cases abates, China on Wednesday shutdown one of its largest makeshift hospitals built in February to treat the surging COVID-19infections in Wuhan, the epicentre of the pandemic, as the last group of thousands of medical workers … [+2537 chars]
